verbs.description: The Christian right in America [V: has] never before been under such a spotlight , primarily because it has been fascinating from a psychological and a political point of view to see how they have all been justifying ( and sometimes not ) the force that is Trump . Even here , at ATP , some religious commenters ( such as See Noevo ) …
